body.name: Dash Cam Wi-Fi 2K, Front Dash Camera for Cars, External GPS Module Support, Mini Dashboard Car Camera with APP, IPS Screen, Super Night Vision, Loop Recording, 24H Parking Monitor, G-Sensor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: ⏳【Elevate Your Dashcam Experience】Specially prepared optional 64GB SD card, GPS module, and hardwire kit for your selection. (📧If you need, please reach out to us at our email (service@avylet.com) to learn how to get them. Deadline: Before Feb. 18th) . Our primary intention is to simplify your use of dash cam. 💟 Warm Tips: If you can't view the Live View in the app, try disabling phone's cellular data. If you still can't access SD card videos, download the videos to the app's album for viewing

📡【Bulit-in Wi-Fi & Customized Free APP】Effortlessly adjust settings, view live stream, and playback recorded footage on both dash cam and smartphone using the Avylet APP (No subscription fee). You can also download (without data) and instantly share (data required) videos and photos with your friends and family through popular social media platforms or messaging apps directly from Avylet app.💟 If you can't find Wi-Fi on your phone: Turn on dashcam WiFi, return to preview mode to save settings.

🪂【2K Super Night Vision】The Avylet dash cam features 2K Super Night Vision with the High-performance chipset and a SONY sensor. It's equipped with an F1.6 aperture（Optimize light intake and minimize motion blur）, 6-layer Glass Lens(Superior scratch resistance and high-temperature tolerance) and WDR Technology（Balance exposure and reduce glare, optimize contrast）, ensuring clearer and more detailed video in low-light situations, effectively capturing road conditions.

🛰️【External GPS Module】Support for an optional GPS module allows the dashcam to record your location (longitude and latitude), driving route, speed, and time in videos. This information is easily accessible when playing back videos on a PC, simplifying the process of providing vital footage for insurance claims. (The GPS module is not included, and to view GPS data in your videos, 💬 reach out to us to download the necessary player)

📻【Genuine 2K & Wide 170° Front View】Offers enhanced clarity, making recordings clearer and allowing for better visibility of essential elements like license plates and road signs. With a 170° wide-angle lens, you can capture an expansive view of the road, effectively minimizing blind spots and providing a comprehensive recording of your surroundings while driving.

🏴󠁶󠁵󠁭󠁡󠁰󠁿【24/7 Parking Monitor for Continuous Protection】Motion Detection: If any motion is detected within the car camera's field of view, the dashcam will initiate a 30-second video recording. Time-lapse Recording: The dashboard camera captures video efficiently at a chosen frame rate (e.g., 1/2/5/10 frames per second) while parked, highlighting important moments and saving storage space. Important Notice: To activate parking modes, you will require a hardwire kit.

📽️【Sleek and Unobtrusive Dash Cam】The compact design and mini body ensures it can be discreetly hidden behind the rearview mirror and the concealed installation design won't obstruct your sight. In addition, the user-friendly 1.5" IPS screen enables you to access settings, view recordings, and capture snapshots with ease.

🌡️【Extreme Temperature-Resistant Super Capacitors】Super capacitors, often found in high-end dashcams, have a significant edge over traditional batteries. They charge rapidly, store energy efficiently, and boast a longer lifespan—extending usage by up to 30%. What's more, their remarkable tolerance for extreme heat and cold (Temperature Range: -4°F to 158°F ) and enhanced stability make them a safer choice.

🎖️【Passionate Customer Care】Your car dash camera is backed by our comprehensive coverage, including a 2-year warranty and lifelong tech support. To access our support, simply reach out to us (refer to the contact information provided in the instruction manual) directly or visit our website at Avylet.com. Rest assured, we will respond to your inquiries within 12 hours.

💥【Loop Recording & Collision Protection】Automatically replaces the oldest video with the newest, ensuring you always have the latest footage to view, even when your memory card is full. When a collision occurs, whether you're on the move or parked, the G-sensor locks and secures crucial video clips. This ensures you won't lose those pivotal moments, regardless of the situation.

Mini & Compact Design，Enhance Your Driving Safety Direct Control The physical buttons on the dashcam allow for intuitive adjustment of settings and direct device operation. With the IPS screen, you can view videos and settings menu directly on the dashcam, eliminating the need for additional equipment or apps and improving user-friendliness. Compact Design With the inconspicuous design, are discreet and less noticeable, reducing the risk of theft and unwanted attention. Our dashcams offer flexible installation options within the vehicle, allowing it to be discreetly placed behind the rearview mirror or in other inconspicuous locations.

Unable to access the live view on APP? After successfully connecting to Wi-Fi, turn off the cellular data on your phone, and then try accessing the live view interface again. If the problem persists, reach out to us. Doesn't connect to the cellphone? 1. Confirm you've downloaded correct version of Avylet app. 2. After turning on the WiFi of dashcam, return to preview mode to save settings in case you can't search for Wi-Fi. 3. Try turning off and on Wi-Fi on your phone, then attempt to reconnect. Is it possible to save a video to a mobile phone album? Android allows direct video downloads to the phone's album. iPhones can't save TS stream format videos in the album, so you can only download videos and store them in the album of Avylet APP. This enables easy access to videos without using data. Is there a subscription fee for the Avylet app? No, the Avylet app is completely free. Whether you download this app from the App Store or Google Play, there's no need for any subscription fees. Additionally, when using the Avylet app to download videos, no data or charges are required. The screen asked for SD card, after put in SD card the screen all black. Removed SD card then turn on still black. Why? Insert the SD card while dash cam is off, then connect it to power source using the original car charger. Format the SD card as FAT32 to ensure proper functionality. Supports up to 128GB SD Card. Using a larger card may cause crashes or shutdowns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Camera, Big Value
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam has phenomenal picture quality, even at night, which is impressive given that it doesn't cost an arm and a leg. I am also impressed by the wide field the camera captures. It's a breeze to install, even for someone like me who isn't the most tech savvy person in the world. Because it's so small, I can barely tell it's attached to my windshield - My rear view mirror almost completely blocks it from my view, so it's definitely not a distraction. Despite its small size, I was able to use the various buttons without any issues, and I found the settings to be intuitive and very easy to navigate. Be aware that you will need to buy an SD card - I purchased one with 256 GB of memory, which allowed me to set my camera to the highest quality picture resolution without having to worry about running out of memory too quickly. Overall, I am very pleased with this dash cam!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup, easy to use, impressive video quality for dash cam
reviews.reviewText: Pros: - Setup was a breeze, much easier than my other camera. - Camera can be fully configured via Wi-Fi. All of the options on the camera exist in the app. - Wi-Fi can be disabled for security reasons and re-enabled later. - Camera is extremely responsive. You can watch a live feed and it's even faster than my home surveillance system. - Camera quality is surprisingly good. It looks like a professional grade video you would expect to see on a business vehicle. I think this is the most surprising feature. - Audio recording can be disabled. - Watermarks/speed/date can be disabled from video. - Screen can be turned off with a single button press. - Buttons are sturdy, easy to press, and the menus actually make sense. - Not broken English! - You can take a still picture, and also activate an emergency recording which cannot be deleted. - Recordings can be played through the app without having to remove the SD card from the camera.Cons: - Daylight Savings Time (DST) is not supported, but most dash cams don't anyway - Wi-Fi password is shown by pressing Wi-Fi information option, which is insecure, although you can disable Wi-Fi and re-enable it when needed - You have to create an account the use the app, although it just takes a minute - Timezone is not staying set. It continues to revert back to GMT -4, although this doesn't matter because the time is kept correctly. Contacted support about this issue. - Support bubble in the app cannot be turned off, although this did make contacting support extremely easy and you can drag the bubble to a corner. - Green LED flashes when recording. The green LED is not distracting at all, and you likely will not notice it unless you are looking at the camera. - Camera files are saved in .TS format which is actually MPEG-2. Quality is fine, but most people aren't familiar with .TS format. Files can be converted with third-party software. The file format won't matter unless you're trying to share files, then the other person may need VLC player or similar to play unless the file is converted.Overall thoughts: - I really love this dash cam. Definitely better than the other one I purchased a few years ago, which was actually more back then! - The quality is outstanding for the price. Even at night. Others mentioned you could read license plates, but I found you could only read license plates if the vehicle was directly in front of you. It was not able to see the characters on plates in a parking lot. - I would purchase and recommend this camera to others. What I love is that you can configure everything from the app. No need to fiddle with buttons. - I also love that you can watch your dash cam live, and play back videos on your phone without having to remove the SD card. I wish that videos were in MP4/MKV format, but those can easily be converted with ffmpeg on the computer or various apps on mobile. - Saved files can be played through the app without having to remove SD card. This is a lifesaver. With my previous dash cam I had to remove the SD card and use a special adapter on my phone to play them. With this one I just turn on Wi-Fi, connect the app, and instantly play the files.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and compact dashcam with great features
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a dash cam that was small and didn’t cover much of the windshield while driving, and this product got the job done perfectly. Installing and setting up this dashcam was very easy and straightforward. And because it came with a long cable, I didn’t have any issues mounting it to my windshield. This dash cam captures high quality footage, ensuring no details are missed with its wide angle lens even during the night time. With that said, I loved this dash cam and I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a inexpensive high quality camera to document their journeys, then this dashcam would be prefect for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small in size but great features
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small dash cam that didn't block my view and this is perfect. I mounted it behind and just slightly below my rear view mirror, just enough to see the screen. Installing and setting it up was very simple. I downloaded the app and it was seamless. Video is crystal clear and covers a wide path. I was actually very impressed with video play back,better than the more expensive one in my other vehicle. Overall I am very happy with this product and would definitely recommend it if you are looking for a small ,inexpensive dash cam !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, discrete camera that makes capturing events while driving simple and convenient
reviews.reviewText: This camera is small which makes it easy to install wherever you need it. The one important thing to consider is the power cable... the power cable this comes with is very long which is nice but if you want to ensure that the installation is clean and doesn't have any wires hanging, you will need to put some effort into that process. Regular use is easy, the camera starts recording as soon as it gets power and records a file at the interval determined in the settings. Once that interval is reached, a new file is created. The files stay on the SD card until the card is full and then new footage overwrites old footage. If you have the additional accessory power kit, you can have this camera record while you are parked, activate on motion or take periodic photos depending on how the settings are configured.I had an incident last winter where a large sheet of ice flew off of the SUV in front of me while we were on the highway. It was impossible to avoid and it hit my windshield causing serious damage. We were able to exchange information with the person but when it came time to get insurance involved, the other driver denied responsibility. If we had a dashcam, we would have been able to prove the situation and our repair costs would have been paid for. I can tell you the repair costs were greater than the cost of the camera... well worth installing and this camera is a good model to use
